history.content: make an  L-bracket which is just two rectangular cuboids joined perpendicularly along one face. They meet at a right angle (90Â°) along a shared edge.

make it 6cm by 3 cm  by 1 cm on the XY plane and there should be overlap along the 1cm edge such that there is no overhang
